sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_805f91406fd3310081e579354b3ee403
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_mrkting_ev.totalCost</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Calculate and return the total cost of a marketing event.</description><name>totalCost</name><script><![CDATA[var totalCost = Class.create();
totalCost.prototype = {
    initialize: function(mrkevent) {
		this.mrkevent = mrkevent;
    },
	
	getCost: function() {
		var cost = 0;
		//Get the total cost of all equipment for this event
		var equipment = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_equipment_request');
		equipment.addQuery('marketing_event', this.mrkevent);
		equipment.query();
		while(equipment.next()){
			cost = cost + parseFloat(equipment.cost.getCurrencyValue());
		}
		return cost;
	},	

    type: 'totalCost'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 17:41:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>805f91406fd3310081e579354b3ee403</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>totalCost</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_805f91406fd3310081e579354b3ee403</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-03 17:41:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_24e1ed006fd3310081e579354b3ee4d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Marketing Event Events</name><order>300</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	//Add event when attendees reaches capacity
	var registered = current.attendees_registered.getDisplayValue();
	var capacity = current.max_capacity.getDisplayValue();
	if(registered == capacity) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.at_capacity', current, current.sys_id, current.event_coordinator);
	}
	//Add event when attendees exceeds capacity
	if(registered > capacity) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.over_capacity', current, current.sys_id, current.event_coordinator);
	}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_7fd479c06fd3310081e579354b3ee471
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Calculate total cost</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var budget = current.budget;
	var mrkevent = current.sys_id;
	var evtname = current.name;
	//Get the total cost of equipment for this event
	var equipment = new totalCost(mrkevent);
	var cost = equipment.getCost();
	//Compare cost to budget
	if(cost > budget){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Equipment costs for ' + evtname + ' exceed the event budget.');
	}
	//Populate cost
	current.event_cost = cost;
	//Populate Budget remaining
	var remaining = budget - cost;
	current.budget_remaining = remaining;
	current.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 19:14:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7fd479c06fd3310081e579354b3ee471</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate total cost</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7fd479c06fd3310081e579354b3ee471</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-14 16:44:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7fd479c06fd3310081e579354b3ee471"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_3616a9406fd3310081e579354b3ee49e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.added</event_name><name>Add attendee</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//Get marketing event from event
var mrkevent = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event');
mrkevent.get(event.parm1);
//Count attendees for marketing event
var numOfAttendees = 0;
var attendees = new GlideAggregate('x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee');
attendees.addQuery('marketing_event', event.parm1);
attendees.addAggregate('COUNT');
attendees.query();
if(attendees.next())
	numOfAttendees = attendees.getAggregate('COUNT');
//Set attendees registered field
mrkevent.attendees_registered = numOfAttendees;
mrkevent.update();]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 18:09:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3616a9406fd3310081e579354b3ee49e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add attendee</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_3616a9406fd3310081e579354b3ee49e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-03 18:09:33</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2911e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee4ea
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Attendee Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	//Add event when attendee inserted
	if(current.operation() == 'insert' && current.marketing_event.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.added', current, current.marketing_event, current.email);
	}
	//Add event when marketing event changes
	if(current.operation() == 'update' && current.marketing_event.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.delete', previous, previous.marketing_event, previous.email);
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.added', current, current.marketing_event, current.email);
	}
	//Add event when attendee deleted
	if(current.operation() == 'delete') {
		gs.eventQueue('x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.delete', current, current.marketing_event, current.email);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 17:49:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2911e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee4ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attendee Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2911e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee4ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-07 17:43:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2911e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee4ea"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Validate marketing event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var evtbudget = current.budget.getCurrencyValue();
	if(evtbudget < 1){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Budget must be greater than zero');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 17:45:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bc70e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee471</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate marketing event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bc70e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee471</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-07 17:43:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bc70e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee471"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_7486e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee48b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_snc_mrkting_ev.attendee.delete</event_name><name>Remove attendee</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//Get marketing event from event
var mrkevent = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event');
mrkevent.get(event.parm1);
//Count attendees for marketing event
var numOfAttendees = 0;
var attendees = new GlideAggregate('x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee');
attendees.addQuery('marketing_event', event.parm1);
attendees.addAggregate('COUNT');
attendees.query();
if(attendees.next())
	numOfAttendees = attendees.getAggregate('COUNT');
//Set attendees registered field
mrkevent.attendees_registered = numOfAttendees;
mrkevent.update();]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 18:11:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7486e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee48b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Remove attendee</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_7486e1406fd3310081e579354b3ee48b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-03 18:11:14</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_416da9806fd3310081e579354b3ee41d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee</collection><condition>current.sales_prospect == false;</condition><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Add Sales Prospects</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAsync(current) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	try { 
		//Combine first and last names
		var fullname = current.first_name + ' ' + current.last_name;
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_mrkting_ev.Synch Sales Prospects', 'post');
		r.setStringParameter('u_email', current.email);
		r.setStringParameter('u_name', fullname);
		r.setStringParameter('u_phone', current.phone);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		current.sales_prospect = true;
		current.update();
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.getMessage();
	} 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 18:42:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>416da9806fd3310081e579354b3ee41d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add Sales Prospects</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_416da9806fd3310081e579354b3ee41d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-07 17:43:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=416da9806fd3310081e579354b3ee41d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_processor_63e76d406fd3310081e579354b3ee42d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_processor"><sys_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><description>Calculate the attendance of a marketing event</description><interactive>false</interactive><name>getAttendance</name><parameters>mrkevent</parameters><params_endpoint>x_snc_mrkting_ev_mrkevent</params_endpoint><path>getAttendance</path><path_endpoint>x_snc_mrkting_ev_getAttendance</path_endpoint><roles/><script><![CDATA[g_response.setContentType('text/html;charset=UTF-8');

//Get Sys ID from URL parameter
var sid = g_request.getParameter('x_snc_mrkting_ev_mrkevent');

//Look up marketing event name from Sys ID
var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event');
gr.get(sid);
var name = gr.name;

//Check ACLs before querying
if(gr.canRead()) {
	
	var numOfAttendees = 0;
	var attendees = new GlideAggregate('x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee');
	attendees.addQuery('marketing_event', sid);
	attendees.addAggregate('COUNT');
	attendees.query();
	if(attendees.next())
		numOfAttendees = attendees.getAggregate('COUNT');

	g_processor.writeOutput('Marketing event ' + name + ' has ' + numOfAttendees + ' attendees');
} else {
	g_processor.writeOutput('Access denied');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_processor</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 18:17:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>63e76d406fd3310081e579354b3ee42d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getAttendance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_processor_63e76d406fd3310081e579354b3ee42d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-03 18:17:40</sys_updated_on><type>script</type></sys_processor></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_attendee</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Update attendee count</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event');
	gr.get(current.marketing_event);
	gr.attendees_registered += 1;
	gr.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-07 16:30:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6a5518436f73f10081e579354b3ee493</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update attendee count</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6a5518436f73f10081e579354b3ee493</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-05-07 17:43:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6a5518436f73f10081e579354b3ee493"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f6e9fd726f84060081e579354b3ee425
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_mrkting_ev_marketing_event</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Debug total cost</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
   //This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var cost = 0;
	var budget = current.budget;
	var mrkevent = current.sys_id;
	var evtname = current.name;
	//Get the total cost of equipment for this event
	var equipment = new GlideRecord('x_snc_mrkting_ev_equipment_request');
	equipment.addQuery('marketing_event', mrkevent);
	equipment.query();
	while(equipment.next()){
		cost = cost + equipment.cost;
	}
	//Compare cost to budget
	if(cost > budget){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Equipment costs for ' + evtname + ' exceed the event budget.');
	}
	//Populate cost
	current.event_cost = cost;
	//Populate Budget remaining
	var remaining = budget - cost;
	current.budget_remaining = remaining;
	current.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-05-19 15:31:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f6e9fd726f84060081e579354b3ee425</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Debug total cost</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f6e9fd726f84060081e579354b3ee425</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-08-18 01:15:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f6e9fd726f84060081e579354b3ee425"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_script_a909ed406fd3310081e579354b3ee489
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Add Attendees">d9c8ad406fd3310081e579354b3ee460</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//Convert source field to string
var name = source.u_name.toString();
//Split names anywhere there is a space
var split_names = name.split (" ");
//Find the number of names
var num_names = split_names.length;
//If there is only one name map it to the last name
if (num_names == 1) {
target.last_name = split_names[0];
}
//if there are two names map to first and last name
if (num_names == 2) {
target.first_name = split_names[0];
target.last_name = split_names[1];
}
//if there are more than 3 names combine into one middle name
if (num_names >= 3) {
target.first_name = split_names.shift();
target.last_name = split_names.pop();
var middle_name = split_names.join(" ");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-03 18:21:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a909ed406fd3310081e579354b3ee489</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Marketing Events Application" source="x_snc_mrkting_ev">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Marketing Events Application">f7709d8c6f93310081e579354b3ee4f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_a909ed406fd3310081e579354b3ee489</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-03 18:21:34</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
